post.Stay: Stay updated with the latest news and announcements right here! Discover news, helpful updates, and more
post.Get: Get your latest news update from our channel
post.content: The police in Tboung Khmum province recently successfully solved a murder case involving Chinese citizens and arrested four suspects, including two Chinese men and two Burmese men. According to the police report, on March 2, a Chinese male body was found in a cashew orchard in Boyeku County, Tboung Khmum Province. According to forensic identification, the deceased had fractures in the neck and left thigh, and the cause of death was suspicious. According to the police report, on March 2, a Chinese male body was found in a cashew orchard in Boyeku County, Tboung Khmum Province. According to forensic identification, the deceased had fractures in the neck and left thigh, and the cause of death was suspicious.
